title: Lafayette General Health Anywhere
description:
LGH Health Anywhere allows you to speak to a provider on your time – 24 hours a day.  It's easy to use, private and secure. A virtual video chat makes receiving care for common ailments affordable, convenient and fast.

LGH Health Anywhere is great during overnight hours, when you’re on the road for vacation or work, or when anything prevents you from making it to the doctor’s office.

What are the benefits of LGH Health Anywhere?
- Accessible anytime via mobile or web
- No travel required
- Online credit card payment
- Prescriptions to your pharmacy

Use LGH Health Anywhere for symptoms and conditions such as:
- Cold
- Flu
- Rash
- Allergies
- Sore throat
- Sinus infection
- Fever

For emergencies, dial 911 immediately.

recentChanges:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed

comments: This app is a literal lifesaver!! With covid being rampant (and me having an injury that prevents me from driving) having this is essential! The app is easy to use, and the providers really listen and care.
Horrible at try three times and nurse practitioner can't hear or see me but I'm live.
Audio and video froze a few times. This may have been either our connection or something else.
This app is amazing and I love that I can talk to my doctor instead of going to the emergency room I give this app a 5-star rating and would gladly recommend this app
This was so fast and easy. With in 5 mins I had medicine called in for me. The Doctor was so great.
Thank you, LMC and THANK YOU, N.P., Khara!! The app and process was the easiest and most convenient thing ever, and I'm so grateful to Khara for her service today!!
I'm grateful to have this app. With my health conditions, it was better then going in to the hospital, and getting the help from home thanks again lgh.
Easy to use and my appointments were quick. I never had to wait more than a minute or two to talk to the doctor.
Excellent experience! I really appreciated being able to speak to a health professional at home rather than have to go into an urgent care center.
Great service and all without having to leave the house. I highly recommend.

This was an amazing and convenient experience. No going out in public an despising yourself or others to infectious diseases. I couldn't be more pleased with this service. Thanks so much Lafayette General Health!
Love it this is a good app so happy for this it's easy to use and get the job done 😘
I have used this service twice, both experiences were quick and easy.
Great for those who cannot travel. A perfect medium all those involved thank you
Fast, efficient, and professional. Recommend.
My experience was...The Best! No issues with sound etc.🙂🤗
Loved it was so convenient A I'm in a wheelchair and it's a whole lot easier
It is wonderful. Non contact, it great and the discusion is real easy.
Quick, easy, private, and informative.
Slight delay in conversations make it annoying.
Love it, you can talk to a doctor or nurse practitioner without having to go into the office.
Pretty straight forward and works as intended.
Love this app. Very helpful amd easy to use.
Never had video chat with doctor and I was very much pleased.
Quick and easy! Knowledgeable providers
Doctor was so helpful & nice, best experience!!
easy to use, excellent care!
Dr. G was very nice and informative! easier than going to doctors office.
Great tool for health care.
The app gave me easy to follow directions.
very quick & easy to use
Easy to use and quick
Love this app. It works really well.
Very quick and to the point. I will be using this again.
Easy to navigate
Quick and thorough... Love it! 😍
Great!!!! Visit every time.
Christ on a cracker literally!! Someone should have been created this. The nurse that treated me was an angel. Thank you ms Jessie. May Hashem be with you all. Amen.
Very well it was clear I could hear him good. I give him 5 stars.
I really loved this app it was very helpful
